Description:
ResponsibilitiesThe Quantity Surveyor will report to either Associate Director / Senior Commercial Manager.
Will be responsible for organizing measurement tasks when preparing estimates / cost plans
Draft estimates / cost plans for review and finalization with senior management.
Preparation of BOQ including drafting Preambles / General Requirements.
Undertake market review / research for compiling and updating unit rates for estimating.
Responsible for on-site and off-site quantity verifications and confirmation with regards to payments and variation works.
Responsible for checking and verification of all invoices of the said sub packages on site.
Maintain a register of payments
Check the materials on and off site and verified delivery and acceptance from the client’s representative for payment approval.
Prepare and maintain records of all sub-contractors agreement and payments.
On site verification of Final Accounts submitted by the Contractors and selected Sub Contractors and Suppliers, adjusting as necessary and providing recommendations to the Client.Skills
Skills:
Must have Mixed-use development and Infrastructure experiences
Commercial Contract Administration and Change management
Interim valuations and payment certificates
Variations analysis and recommendations, Contractor’s claims
Performing risk and value management and cost control functions
Undertaking costs analysis project work, preparing estimates of variation works.
Identifying, analyzing and developing responses to commercial risks
Preparation of cost report and monitor the cash flow.
Reporting to Client Representative on all commercial issues
Client facing and involvement in commercial meetings
Managing workload with minimal supervision
Understanding the implications of health and safety regulations

Must have previous experience of FIDIC contracts
Degree in Quantity Surveying from recognized university
Min 5 years post-contract experience
Must have consultant and/or client background for minimum of 2 years
Knowledge of the use of QS software or similar is required
Demonstrate strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
Team and /or independent worker
Possess good project background and proven English language technical writing ability and skills.
